attributes.additional_details: Declare a state of emergency in the English Channel, deploy the Royal Navy and physically turn these boats back to France.
attributes.background: The British people are sick of paying tax to fund illegal immigration in to this country. We demand action is taken directly on the south coast to stop any illegal's entering via this route.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709678
